snapshot.note: Generate a bounded repo snapshot for AI context (swap --format=gemini|claude as needed). Default --max-lines=400 for --scope=icl; use --out=auto for file output.

governance.rule: PR-only merges; no direct pushes to main.

roles.integrator: Coordinates work, enforces gates, keeps docs current.
roles.contractor: Proposes changes only on work/* branches; never pushes to main.
